abstract: Mel Rosenthal, a photojournalist and teacher, is retiring from Empire State College after 36 years, and our colleagues on Lens are giving him a sendoff, including a slide show of his work.
snippet: Mel Rosenthal, a photojournalist and teacher, is retiring from Empire State College after 36 years, and our colleagues on Lens are giving him a sendoff, including a slide show of his work.

headline.main: A Passion for Pictures, and for Social Justice
